nodes.text: Fest Batar Stronghold was a base built by the Gormak species in the Old Paths region of the planet Voss. The Gormak used the stronghold as a base for attacks on Voss pilgriims along the nearby Road to Renewal in the Serenity Valley and the Shrine of Healing.
Fest Batar Stronghold appears as a location on Voss in the 2011 video game Star Wars: The Old Republic.
